#summary How to install and run SubDownloader on Windows

= version 2.0 beta: Install from sources =

  * Install [http://www.python.org/ftp/python/2.5.2/python-2.5.2.msi python 2.5]
  * Install latest [http://www.riverbankcomputing.co.uk/static/Downloads/PyQt4/PyQt-Py2.5-gpl-4.4.2-1.exe PyQT for Windows]
  * Download and uncompress the latest tarball [http://subdownloader.googlecode.com/files/subdownloader-SVN_r295.zip sources]
  * *Graphical Interface:* Execute "_run.py_"
  * *Command line version:* Execute "_run.py --help_" to see all the options available

*Note:* It's a beta version. Please give us your [http://code.google.com/p/subdownloader/issues/list feedback]. Thanks.

= version 1.2.9: Windows Installer =

Download and install [http://subdownloader.googlecode.com/files/subdownloader1.2.9.exe Windows Installer 1.2.9]

*Note:* It may not run for Windows Vista or some versions of XP
